training_data.description: Training data for Racoon AI assistant - add question/answer pairs here for training

entries.question: I need more help
entries.correct_answer: No worries! For more help, you can check out the FAQ page or ask in the relevant Slack channels. For general Summer of Making questions, you can send a message to [#summer-of-making-help](https://hackclub.slack.com/archives/C090JKDJYN8) channel. For identity verification issues specifically, use the [#identity-help](https://hackclub.slack.com/archives/C01504DCLVD) channel. I'm here to help too, so feel free to ask me any other questions you've got!
entries.ai_response: For more help, you can check out the FAQ page or ask in the relevant Slack channels, like #identity-help if you're having verification issues. I'm here to help too, so feel free to ask me any other questions you've got!
entries.notes: AI incorrectly suggested #identity-help for general help. Should clarify: #summer-of-making-help for general SoM questions, #identity-help ONLY for ID verification issues.

instructions.how_to_use: When you find an incorrect AI response, add a new entry with the question, AI's response, and the correct answer. Set is_correct to false and add notes about what was wrong.
instructions.response_style: Keep answers friendly, helpful, and concise. Match the tone of Hack Club staff.
